law.catch_line: Appointment to positions created under KRS 16.187.

text.section: Facilities security officers shall be appointed by the secretary as special law enforcement officers under KRS 61.902.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 6, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2009.
